public class BlockEntityColossalChest extends org.cyclops.cyclopscore.blockentity.CyclopsBlockEntity implements net.minecraft.world.MenuProvider, net.minecraft.world.level.block.entity.LidBlockEntity
A machine that can infuse things with blood.

    • detectStructure

      public static void detectStructure(net.minecraft.world.level.LevelReader world, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos location, net.minecraft.core.Vec3i size, boolean valid, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos originCorner)
      Callback for when a structure has been detected for a spirit furnace block.
      Parameters:
      world - The world.
      location - The location of one block of the structure.
      size - The size of the structure.
      valid - If the structure is being validated(/created), otherwise invalidated.
      originCorner - The origin corner
